title: Subtle Swarna Rekha: Diamond-Accented Gold Bracelet
features: A contemporary take on the traditional 'Kadiyam', this bracelet features a flowing, wave-like design in solid gold. Round brilliant diamonds are bezel-set at intervals, adding a touch of modern sparkle. The high polish and clean lines enhance its minimalist appeal.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for a modern woman. Suitable for Diwali
description: This bracelet combines the timeless allure of gold with the modern elegance of diamonds. Its unique, flowing design sets it apart, offering a subtle statement piece that is both sophisticated and comfortable. Crafted with high-quality materials and attention to detail, this piece is designed to last.
